column3: During Fiscal 2019, amounts represent unrealized gains related to the Company’s available-for-sale debt securities. During Fiscal 2018, amounts represent unrealized gains related to the Company’s available-for-sale debt and equity securities.

Adjustment reflects the reclassification of unrealized gains related to the Company’s available-for-sale equity securities as of February 3, 2018 from AOCI into retained earnings associated with the adoption of ASU 2016-01.
